result.markdown:
---
title: "Cortical cells DGE E17.5 Data-set Anaysis"
---

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)
library(tibble)
library(zeallot)
library(COTAN)

options(parallelly.fork.enable = TRUE)

outDir <- "Data/Yuzwa_MouseCortex/"

setLoggingLevel(1)
setLoggingFile(file.path(outDir, "CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis.log"))
```
:::


Read the dataset from file


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
dataset <- read.csv(file.path(outDir <- "Data/Yuzwa_MouseCortex/"
, "GSM2861514_E175_Only_Cortical_Cells_DGE.txt"),
       header = TRUE, sep = "\t", strip.white = TRUE,row.names = 1)
```
:::


Crate the COTAN object


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sampleCondition <- "CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175"
cc175Obj <- COTAN(raw = dataset)
cc175Obj <- initializeMetaDataset(cc175Obj,
                                  GEO = "GSM2861511_E135",
                                  sequencingMethod = "DropSeq",
                                  sampleCondition = sampleCondition)
```
:::


Inspect cells' sizes


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
cellSizePlot(cc175Obj)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Drop cells with too many ritz reads as they are probably duplets


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
cellsSizeThr <- 6000
cc175Obj <- addElementToMetaDataset(cc175Obj, "Cells size threshold", cellsSizeThr)

cells_to_rem <- getCells(cc175Obj)[getCellsSize(cc175Obj) > cellsSizeThr]
cc175Obj <- dropGenesCells(cc175Obj, cells = cells_to_rem)

cellSizePlot(cc175Obj)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Inspect the number of expressed genes per cell


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
genesSizePlot(cc175Obj)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Drop cells with too high genes expession as they are probably duplets


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
genesSizeThr <- 3000
cc175Obj <- addElementToMetaDataset(cc175Obj, "Num genes threshold", genesSizeThr)

numExprGenes <- getNumExpressedGenes(cc175Obj)
cells_to_rem <- names(numExprGenes)[numExprGenes > genesSizeThr]
cc175Obj <- dropGenesCells(cc175Obj, cells = cells_to_rem)

genesSizePlot(cc175Obj)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Check number of mitocondrial genes expressed in each cell


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mitGenesPattern <- "^mt-"
getGenes(cc175Obj)[grep(mitGenesPattern, getGenes(cc175Obj))]
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
 [1] "mt-Co1"  "mt-Co2"  "mt-Co3"  "mt-Cytb" "mt-Nd1"  "mt-Nd2"  "mt-Nd4" 
 [8] "mt-Nd5"  "mt-Nd6"  "mt-Rnr1" "mt-Rnr2" "mt-Ta"   "mt-Tc"   "mt-Te"  
[15] "mt-Tf"   "mt-Ti"   "mt-Tl1"  "mt-Tl2"  "mt-Tm"   "mt-Tp"   "mt-Tq"  
[22] "mt-Ts2"  "mt-Tt"   "mt-Tv"   "mt-Tw"   "mt-Ty"  
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
c(mitPlot, mitSizes) %<-%
  mitochondrialPercentagePlot(cc175Obj, genePrefix = mitGenesPattern)

plot(mitPlot)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Cells with a too high percentage of mitocondrial genes are likely dead (or at the last problematic) cells. So we drop them!


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mitPercThr <- 5.0
cc175Obj <- addElementToMetaDataset(cc175Obj, "Mitoc. perc. threshold", mitPercThr)

cells_to_rem <- rownames(mitSizes)[mitSizes[["mit.percentage"]] > mitPercThr]

cc175Obj <- dropGenesCells(cc175Obj, cells = cells_to_rem)

c(mitPlot, mitSizes) %<-%
  mitochondrialPercentagePlot(cc175Obj, genePrefix = mitGenesPattern)

plot(mitPlot)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Check no further outliers after all the culling


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
cellSizePlot(cc175Obj)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
genesSizePlot(cc175Obj)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-2.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Clean: round 1


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
cc175Obj <- clean(cc175Obj)

c(pcaCellsPlot, pcaCellsData, genesPlot, UDEPlot, nuPlot, nuPlotZoomed) %<-%
  cleanPlots(cc175Obj)

plot(pcaCellsPlot)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(genesPlot)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cc175Obj <- addElementToMetaDataset(cc175Obj, "Num drop B group", 0)
```
:::


B group contains high number of hemoglobin genes: so they are not interesting


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
cells_to_rem <- rownames(pcaCellsData)[pcaCellsData[["groups"]] == "B"]

cc175Obj <- dropGenesCells(cc175Obj, cells = cells_to_rem)
```
:::


Clean: round 2


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
cc175Obj <- clean(cc175Obj)

c(pcaCellsPlot, pcaCellsData, genesPlot, UDEPlot, nuPlot, nuPlotZoomed) %<-%
  cleanPlots(cc175Obj)

plot(pcaCellsPlot)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(genesPlot)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
cc175Obj <- addElementToMetaDataset(cc175Obj, "Num drop B group", 1)
```
:::


Visualize if all is ok:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(pcaCellsData)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(UDEPlot)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(nuPlot)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-3.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
lowUDEThr <- 0.3 # the threshold to remove low UDE cells

nuDf <- data.frame("nu" = sort(getNu(cc175Obj)), "n" = seq_along(getNu(cc175Obj)))
UDEPlot_zoomed <- ggplot(nuDf, aes(x = n, y = nu)) +
            geom_point(colour = "#8491B4B2", size = 1.0) +
            xlim(0L, 400L) +
            ylim(0.0, 1.0) +
            geom_hline(yintercept = lowUDEThr, linetype = "dashed",
                       color = "darkred") +
            annotate(geom = "text", x = 200L, y = 0.25,
                     label = paste0("to remove cells with nu < ", lowUDEThr),
                     color = "darkred", size = 4.5)

plot(UDEPlot_zoomed)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-4.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Drop very low UDE cells as they are likely outliers


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
lowUDEThr <- 0.2
cc175Obj <- addElementToMetaDataset(cc175Obj, "Low UDE threshold", lowUDEThr)

cells_to_rem <- rownames(nuDf)[nuDf[["nu"]] < lowUDEThr]
cc175Obj <- dropGenesCells(cc175Obj, cells = cells_to_rem)
```
:::


Final cleaning to check all is OK


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
cc175Obj <- clean(cc175Obj)

c(pcaCellsPlot, pcaCellsData, genesPlot, UDEPlot, nuPlot, nuPlotZoomed) %<-%
  cleanPlots(cc175Obj)

plot(pcaCellsPlot)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-16-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(genesPlot)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-16-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(UDEPlot)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-16-3.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(nuPlot)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-16-4.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(cellSizePlot(cc175Obj))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-16-5.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(genesSizePlot(cc175Obj))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175-analysis_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-16-6.png){width=672}
:::
:::


Calculate genes' COEX


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
cc175Obj <- proceedToCoex(cc175Obj, calcCoex = TRUE, cores = 12,
                          saveObj = TRUE, outDir = outDir)

gdiData <- calculateGDI(cc175Obj)

genesToLabel <- head(rownames(gdiData[order(gdiData[["GDI"]],
                                            decreasing = TRUE), ]), n = 10L)

genesToLabel

gdiPlot <- GDIPlot(cc175Obj, GDIIn = gdiData, GDIThreshold = 1.4,
                   genes = list("Top 10 GDI genes" = genesToLabel))

plot(gdiPlot)
```
:::


Save the COTAN object


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
saveRDS(cc175Obj, file = file.path(outDir, paste0(sampleCondition, ".cotan.RDS")))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
cc175Obj <- readRDS("Data/Yuzwa_MouseCortex/CorticalCells_GSM2861514_E175.cotan.RDS")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
splitClusters <- cellsUniformClustering(cc175Obj, GDIThreshold = 1.4, cores = 13,
                                        saveObj = TRUE, outDir = outDir)

c(splitCoexDF, splitPValueDF) %<-% DEAOnClusters(cc175Obj, clusters = splitClusters)

cc175Obj <- addClusterization(cc175Obj, clName = "split",
                              clusters = splitClusters,
                              coexDF = splitCoexDF, override = TRUE)

table(splitClusters)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
saveRDS(cc175Obj, file = file.path(outDir, paste0(sampleCondition, ".cotan.RDS")))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
c(mergedClusters, mergedCoexDF, mergedPValueDF) %<-%
  mergeUniformCellsClusters(cc175Obj, clusters = splitClusters,
                            GDIThreshold = 1.4, cores = 13,
                            saveObj = TRUE, outDir = outDir)

cc175Obj <- addClusterization(cc175Obj, clName = "merge",
                              clusters = mergedClusters,
                              coexDF = mergedCoexDF,
                              override = TRUE)

table(mergedClusters)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
saveRDS(cc175Obj, file = file.path(outDir, paste0(sampleCondition, ".cotan.RDS")))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sessionInfo()
```
